## ElFactory type

ServiceDefinition for the el primitive. This is what gets composed into a service context.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ElFactory<TConfig extends AdapterConfig> = ServiceDefinition<'el', {
    <Tag extends string & keyof TConfig['props'] & keyof TConfig['elements']>(tag: Tag): TagFactory<TConfig, Tag>;
}>;
```
**References:** [AdapterConfig](../adapterconfig/)<!-- -->, [ServiceDefinition](../../lattice/servicedefinition/)<!-- -->, [TagFactory](../tagfactory/)
